entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character, mentioned multiple times in the text. He is being called to leave with Mrs. Weasley and Tonks.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who jumps out of the room when Mrs. Weasley shouts at her. She is mentioned as leaving with Harry.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl, which he stuffs into his cage before leaving downstairs.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is a person who shouts at Harry and Hermione to leave the room. She is in charge of getting them ready to go.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is a person who is mentioned as leaving with Mrs. Weasley and Harry.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a person who is mentioned as being told by Dumbledore not to deal with the luggage.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who is mentioned as having given instructions about the luggage.

entities.name: alastor
entities.description: Alastor is a person who is mentioned as dealing with the luggage.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are leaving together, as mentioned in the text: '...and set off downstairs after Hermione'.
Harry owns Hedwig, his owl, which he stuffs into her cage before leaving.
Mrs. Weasley is in charge of getting Harry ready to leave, as mentioned in the text: 'Harry, you’re to come with me and Tonks'.
Dumbledore gave instructions to Sirius about the luggage, as mentioned in the text: 'Oh, for heaven’s sake, Sirius, Dumbledore said no!'
